name: detroit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the largest city in the northern US state of Michigan, near the border with Canada, and the centre of the US car industry: It has become something Detroit can't ignore. It's Motor Show time in Detroit.
More examplesFewer examplesThey moved to Detroit before the First World War.A house in Detroit was recently sold for one dollar.The meeting occured in Detroit.
